Texts.Eng:
Adorable hybrid glowing space raptors with wings. Though they have a disputed, potentially nonexistant origin, they share traits with both Novakids and Avalis, and they are deadly with heavy weapons. 

 Diet: Omnivore 
 
 ^orange;Perks^reset;: 
 Glow in the Dark
 +^green;12^reset;% Speed +^green;15^reset;% Jump, +^green;5^reset;% Energy, 
 Resist: +^green;25^reset;% Ice and fire,  +^green;40^reset;% Radioactive
 ^green;-70^reset;% Fall Dmg, ^green;-5^reset;% knockback, 
 Tech: ^green;Avali Glide^reset;
 Immune: Snow, Ice, Radiation Burn, Basic Cold.
 
 ^orange;Environment^reset;: 
 High winds grant additional agility 
 On ^green;Radioactive^reset; biomes gain ^green;15^reset;% Energy and Health
 ^green;Regenerate^reset; from sunlight when fed. +^green;20^reset;% Energy Regen.
 Night regen ^red;consumes food^reset; and -^red;25^reset;% Energy 
 
 ^orange;Weapons^reset;:
 +^green;10^reset;% airborne damage
 Energy: +^green;12^reset;% Dmg
 Grenade Launcher: +^green;20^reset;% Crit Dmg
 Sniper: +^green;2^reset;% Crit Chance and +^green;10^reset;% Crit Damage
 
 ^red;Weaknesses^reset;: 
 -^red;50^reset;% Shadow, -^red;10^reset;% Physical, -^red;15^reset;% Electrical resists.
  -^red;5^reset;% Health
